alert.note: Alert for San Miguel (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 05 at 2:49PM MDT until July 05 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Colorado, including the following counties, Dolores and San Miguel. * WHEN...Until 415 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 249 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 1 and 1.3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of North Central Dolores and Central San Miguel Counties
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
